nincs elérhető statisztika erre az órára.

One or more recipients have not performe: One or more recipients have not performed the first login yet. This means they won't be receiving reports.
This user has not performed the first lo: This user has not performed the first login yet.
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the a:
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the report anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers.

Using Let's Encrypt requires agreement t: Using Let's Encrypt requires agreement to their Terms of Service.
This interface can generate a Private Ke: This interface can generate a Private Key and a Certificate Signing Request. The Certificate Signing Request can be provided to a Certificate Authority to retrieve a Certificate. After having validated your request and your ownership of the hostname, the Certificate Authority will issue you a Certificate and provide a file containing Intermediate Certificates. Load the Certificate and the file containing the Intermediate Certificates to complete the HTTPS setup.
The platform supports the configuration: The platform supports the configuration of HTTPS through this interface.
Using automatic HTTPS configuration will: Using automatic HTTPS configuration will handle the entire process of requesting, enabling and renewing certificates from the Let's Encrypt Certificate Authority.
The platform must be reachable through a: The platform must be reachable through a public IP address and the selected hostname must have a corresponding DNS record referencing that address.
The manual configuration wizard will gui: The manual configuration wizard will guide you through the setup of HTTPS from an alternative Certificate Authority.
Allowing whistleblowers to connect over: Allowing whistleblowers to connect over HTTPS preserves their privacy but not their anonymity.
Let the platform be reachable without To: Let the platform be reachable without Tor

By using the Tor network and creating an: By using the Tor network and creating an Onion Service, Ricochet is an instant messaging app that allows you to chat while protecting your privacy and staying anonymous by not revealing your location or IP address. You won't notice any difference from an insecure chat, except that you will be using a unique address instead of a phone number/email/username.

This could be a sign of an attack (for e: Ez lehet egy támadás jele (például: valaki elárasztja a kiszolgálót hamis információval), vagy csak egy használati kiugrás a projektje megnövekedett látogatottsága miatt.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: The server cannot guarantee that a new report can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.
Please consider asking your technical su: Please consider asking your technical support to create more disk space on the server.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: A GlobaLeaks technológia tartalmaz egy szerver állapot ellenőrző összetevőt, ami riasztja, amennyiben valami a figyelmét igényli.

Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Érvényes PGP-kulcs nélkül a rendszer nem fog tudni titkosított értesítéseket küldeni.

This is an email to notify you of a new: This is an email to notify you of a new comment on an existing report.

Failed HTTPS certificate renewal: A HTTPS tanúsítvány megújítása sikertelen volt.

If you didn't make this request, you may: If you didn't make this request, you may safely ignore and delete this email.
You can confirm your request by clicking: A következő linkre kattintva megerősítheti kérését:
This is an email to inform you that your: Ez egy email arról, hogy a PGP-kulcsa le fog járni vagy már lejárt.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
Click the link to activate the platform:: Kattinton a linkre a platform aktiválásához:
It is good security practice to keep the: It is good security practice to keep the platform up to date.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: To learn about new features and bug fixes in the new version consult the change log at: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: For instructions on software updates, please refer to the documentation at: {UpdateGuideUrl}
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.
